configuration.styles:
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jstree/3.2.1/themes/default/style.min.css" />
			.featherlight-image { cursor: help; } 
			 .report-name { padding-left: 10px; } .report-name > img { float: left;height: 90%;margin-left: 30px;margin-top: 2px;width: auto;} 
			 .dark nav, .dark .side-nav {background: #ce0000;} 
			 nav {background-color: #ce0000!important;padding-left: 70px; position: fixed; z-index: 1;} 
			 h5.details-name {color: #15238f; text-transform: capitalize;} 
			 thead>tr>th { color: #15238f !important; font-weight: bold;} 
			 li.analysis.waves-effect.active { background: #15238f;} 
			 ul#slide-out { background: #15238f; } 
			 .nav-right li { border-left: 0px solid #ce0000 !important; font-size: 12px;padding: 0 10px; } 
			 .nav-right li { color; #fff !important } 
			 .side-nav.fixed a, .side-nav li>a { color: #fff !important } 
			 a.test-view {color: #ce0000 !important; } 
			 .side-nav li:hover, .side-nav li.active { background-color: #ce0000!important; } 
			 li.analysis.waves-effect.active { background: #ce0000;} 
			 .logo-container { display: none; } 
			 li.theme-selector { display: none !important; } 
			 li.theme-selector { display: none;} 
			 li.analysis.waves-effect.active { color: white !important; } 
			 .blue-grey.lighten-3 { background-color: #922a8e!important;} 
			 .red.lighten-2 { background-color: #ec2028 !important;} 
			 .green.lighten-2 { background-color: #0773bb!important;} 
			.col.s12.m12.l4.fh>div { background: #ce0000;} 
			.col.s12.m12.l4.fh span.panel-name { color: white; font-family: Arial; } 
			.col.s12.m12.l4.fh span.pass-percentage { color: white; } 
			.col.s12.m12.l4.fh>div>span.pass-percentage panel-lead {color: white; font-family:"Arial";} 
			.card-panel table>tbody td:nth-child(1) { background: #15238f; color: white !important; font-family: initial; border: 1px solid !important; } 
			.card-panel, .card { background: #f0f1f1; border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: black; background: linear-gradient(to var(--form-gradient-direction),var(--form-gradient-start-color),var(--form-gradient-end-color));box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 20%), 0 6px 20px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 19%); overflow: auto !important;word-break: break-word;} 
			.col.l2.m4.s6 { background-color: #f0f1f1 !important; border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: black;} 
			.card-panel table>tbody td:nth-child(2) { color: #202429!important; font-family: initial;} 
			.label.outline { border: 1px solid !important; border-radius: 3px !important; margin-top: 0 !important; padding: 2px 5px !important;} 
			.panel-lead { display: block; font-size: 50px; text-align: center;} 
			body { background: #fff !important; user-select: none !important;} 
			#dashboard-view .progress {margin-top: 0px;} 
			.card-panel.heading>h5 {display: none;} 
			.card-panel.heading:after { display: inline; content: "@Test/Automation Test Case"; text-transform: capitalize; color: #15238f; font-size: 20px; font-family: var(--base-font-weight-bold); font-weight: bold;} 
			.featherlight .featherlight-close-icon { position: absolute; z-index: 9999; top: 0; right: 0;line-height: 25px; width: 25px; cursor: pointer; text-align: center; 
			font-family: Arial,sans-serif; background: #f03861; background: rgba(240, 56, 97,.3); color: #fff !important; border-color: var(--button-tertiary-border-color); color: var(--button-tertiary-foreground-color); border-width: var(--button-tertiary-border-width); font-size: var(--button-tertiary-font-size); font-weight: var(--button-tertiary-font-weight); border-radius: 100%;} 
			span.featherlight-close-icon.featherlight-close:hover {transform: rotate(45deg);} 
			div#dashboard-view .label.outline { background: #fff!important; color: #202429!important; border-color: #939598 !important; border-width: 1.59375px !important; background-size: auto !important; cursor: pointer; }
			div#dashboard-view .label.outline:hover { border-color: #202429 !important;}
			.status.skip, .skip > i { color: gold ! important; }
			.status.fail, .fail i { color: #FC100D; }
			.featherlight .featherlight-content { position: relative; text-align: left; vertical-align: middle; display: inline-block; overflow: unset !important; padding: 25px 25px 0; border-bottom: 25px solid transparent; min-width: 30%; margin-left: 5%; margin-right: 5%; max-height: 95%; background: unset !important; cursor: auto; white-space: normal; }
			.footer { left: 0; bottom: 0; width: 100%; background-color: #ce0000!important; height: 15px; position: fixed;height: 17px;text-align: inherit !important;z-index: 1; }
			.footer>div { text-align: end; line-height: normal; width: 100%; cursor: none; position: fixed; font-family: cursive; font-size: xx-small; color: white; }
			.footer>shivakumar { color: white; font-family: serif; font-size: small; line-height: initial; display: inline-table; vertical-align: top; min-height: 10em; overflow: hidden; text-align: start; min-height: 10em; }
			.side-nav { background:0 ; transition-duration: .25s; top:0 ; width: 60px; border-right: 0px !important;margin-top: 48px;height: 100%;}
			.container { max-width: none !important; width: 100% !important; padding-top: 65px; margin: auto !important; box-sizing: inherit !important;}
			.UZB-Copy { color: white; padding-left: 30% !important; line-height: inherit !important; font-size: smaller; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle; min-height: 10em; overflow: hidden; text-align: start; overflow: hidden; text-align: start; min-height: 10em;}
			sup { top: -0.3em; color: floralwhite; font-weight: 900; font-family: auto; overflow: hidden; text-align: start; overflow: hidden; text-align: start; min-height: 10em;}
			td.step-details { white-space: break-spaces !important; height: 200px; padding: 10px; overflow-x: auto !important; float: left; overflow: scroll; width: -webkit-fill-available !important; font-weight: normal !important; background-color: #f5f5f5 !important; font-family: monospace;}
			.test-steps th:nth-child(4){visibility: hidden; position: relative}
			.test-steps th:nth-child(4):after { content: "Response Body";visibility: visible; position: relative; padding-left: 80px;}
			.test-steps th:nth-child(3){visibility: hidden; position: relative; padding-right: 223px;}
			.test-steps th:nth-child(3):after { content: "Test Result";visibility: visible; position: absolute; }
			td.step-details::-webkit-scrollbar-track { -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.9); border-radius: 10px; background-color: #CCCCCC; }
			td.step-details::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 12px; background-color: #F5F5F5; }
			td.step-details::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { border-radius: 10px; background-color: #cd0000; background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(21, 35, 143, 0.4) 50%, transparent, transparent); }
			td.step-name{ padding-left: 120px;word-wrap: break-word; color: #54790d !important; font-weight: bolder;padding-left: 70px !important;}
			.test-desc{margin-bottom: 10px; color: chocolate; font-family: cursive; font-weight: 500;}
			.json-key { color: #ba4360; }
			.json-value { color: green; }
			.json-string { color: #7298c5; }
            div#error_response { color: #eb3941; }
            div#refer_resp { color: #1a0dab; font-size: xx-small; cursor: pointer; }
            span#hand_icon { font-size: small;}
            div#refer_resp:hover { text-decoration: underline !important; }
            ::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 5px; height: 5px;}
            ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { border-radius: 10px; background-color: #D62929; background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient( 90deg , transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4) 50%, transparent, transparent);}
            ::-webkit-scrollbar-track { 	background-color: #fff;}
            .test-steps th:first-child, .test-steps td:first-child{text-align: left !important; max-width: 65px !important; width: auto !important;}
            .status i { font-size :3rem !important;}
            .card.green-accent {width: 97% !important;}
            .test-name, .category-name {font-size: 14px !important; font-family: monospace !important;}
            .card.pink-accent { background: #f96868 !important; text-align: end !important;}
            span#innerdiv { padding-left: 10px;font-weight: bolder;padding-right: 6px;color: blue; cursor: pointer;}
            thead {word-break: keep-all !important; }
            span#innerdiv:hover {color: navy; }
